name: Slippery slices
description:
Deliver all the pizzas without dropping any and avoiding all the obstacles!

Controls are in-game

This was made for the ludum dare 49, which the theme was "Unstable". I had other stuff this weekend, so I only used a fraction of the 72 hours, which is why there’s no audio and the graphics were a bit rushed, but I’m still happy with the result since it’s complete game with a unique gameplay mechanic!

I will mostly like release an improved post-jam version which will include audio and more polished ;)
